alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln and southwestern Custer Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking Showers and thunderstorms with gusty winds extending from near Arnold to 10 miles northeast of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arnold, Callaway, Oconto, Etna, Milldale, Finchville and Lodi. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 247 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Nebraska.
